music.yt_requires: Requires: pip install yt-dlp + ffmpeg on PATH
music.yt_install_hint: Install and restart the app to unlock YouTube radio
music.yt_desc: Instrumental music without lyrics - streamed from YouTube

settings.title: Settings
settings.method_pomodoro_desc: 25 min work, 5 min break, big 15 min break every 4 cycles. Best for focused, intensive work in blocks.
settings.method_20_20_20_desc: Every 20 min look 20 sec at something 6m away. Developed by eye doctors — protects eyes during long screen work.
settings.method_52_17_desc: 52 min work, 17 min break. DeskTime research — this is how the most productive workers operate.
settings.method_90_min_desc: 90 min work, 5 min break, big 20 min every 3 cycles. Based on the body's natural ultradian rhythm.
settings.method_custom_desc: Set your own intervals using the sliders below.
settings.sound_on_break: Sound at break start and end
settings.telemetry_desc: Help us improve the app. No personal data collected.
settings.track_titles_desc: Disabled = saves only program names (more privacy)

help.title: Help
help.text:
HEALTHDESK - USER GUIDE

SYSTEM TRAY ICON
  Right-click the green icon next to the Windows clock:
  • Open             - opens the main app window
  • I drank a glass  - logs a glass in the water tracker
  • Pause (30 min)   - pauses all reminders
  • Quit             - closes the application

  Double-click the icon also opens the window.

WINDOW NAVIGATION
  On the left side you'll find the navigation panel:
  • Home       - dashboard with daily summary
  • Statistics - detailed daily and weekly data
  • Audio      - focus sounds (brown noise, rain, forest...)
  • Settings   - configure intervals, modes, work hours
  • Help       - this window

BREAKS
  The app reminds you about breaks in two modes:

  Moderate mode (default):
    A small always-on-top window with countdown.
    You can click "Skip" or "Taking a break!".

  Aggressive mode:
    Full-screen block with countdown.
    Emergency exit: click 3 times quickly (within 2 seconds).

  Break types:
    • Small break (20-20-20) - every 20 min, look 20 sec at distance
    • Big break - every 60 min, 5 min rest + exercise

EXERCISES
  Eyes: blinking, eye movements, near/far focus, figure eights.
  Stretching: neck, shoulders, torso, wrists, legs, back.
  Exercises appear automatically during breaks.

HYDRATION
  The app reminds you to drink water (default: every 30 min).
  Daily goal: 8 glasses (configurable in Settings).
  You can quickly add a glass from the navigation panel (+1 water).

ACTIVITY TRACKING
  The app checks the active window every 5 seconds and categorizes:
    • Work         - IDE, Office, editors
    • Entertainment - YouTube, games, media
    • Communication - Teams, Slack, Zoom
    • Browser      - Chrome, Firefox, Edge
    • Other        - everything else

  Data is visible in the Statistics tab.

FOCUS SOUNDS
  The Audio tab offers natively generated sounds (no internet):
    • Brown Noise - deep, soothing noise
    • Rain       - rain with droplets
    • White/Pink Noise - even noise
    • Ambient Drone - deep tone with modulation
    • Forest     - wind in trees, birds

  Sound plays in the background even after closing the window.

YOUTUBE RADIO
  Instrumental music without lyrics, streamed from YouTube:
    • Lofi Girl - lofi hip hop beats
    • Jazz Cafe - smooth jazz & bossa nova
    • Classical Focus - classical music
    • Synthwave Radio - synthwave instrumental
    • Piano & Ambient - calm piano

  You can also paste your own YouTube link.
  Requires: yt-dlp (pip install yt-dlp) + ffmpeg on PATH.

WORK HOURS
  In Settings you can enable work hours (e.g. 8:00-18:00).
  Outside these hours, reminders are paused.

AUTOSTART
  Settings > "Start with Windows" - the app will start
  automatically after logging into the system.

DATA
  Configuration and database are in:
    %APPDATA%\HealthDesk\
  You can delete this folder to reset the application.

break.small_desc:
Look away from the screen and focus
on an object about 6 meters away.
break.big_desc:
Get up from your desk for {minutes} minutes.
Stretch, drink water, move around!

break_fs.small_desc:
Look away from the screen.
Focus on something far away. Let your eyes rest.
break_fs.big_desc:
Get up from the computer. Stretch.
Drink some water. Your body will thank you!
break_fs.msg_health: Every break is an investment in health

exercises.name: Near / far focus
steps: Look at your thumb (30 cm) for 5 sec
Look at a distant object for 5 sec

exercises.name: Figure eight
steps: Imagine a large figure eight on the wall
Follow its shape slowly with your eyes

stretch.title: Time to stretch!
stretch.tip: Don't push too hard - movements should be gentle!

exercises.name: Neck stretch
exercises.desc:
1. Tilt head to the right (15 sec)
2. Tilt head to the left (15 sec)
3. Lower chin to chest (15 sec)
4. Tilt head backwards (15 sec)

exercises.name: Shoulder stretch
exercises.desc:
1. Right arm over head, bend at elbow
   Left hand presses on elbow (15 sec)
2. Repeat on the other side
3. Clasp hands behind back, push chest out (15 sec)

exercises.name: Torso twist
exercises.desc:
1. Sit straight on the chair
2. Place right hand on left knee
3. Gently twist to the left (15 sec)
4. Repeat on the other side

exercises.name: Wrists and hands
exercises.desc:
1. Extend arm forward, palm up
2. With other hand gently pull fingers down (15 sec)
3. Repeat with palm down
4. Rotate wrists - 10 times each direction

exercises.name: Leg stretch
exercises.desc:
1. Extend leg forward (15 sec)
2. Switch legs (15 sec)
3. Stand up - 5 squats
4. Rise on toes 10 times

exercises.name: Back stretch
exercises.desc:
1. Sit on the edge of the chair
2. Bend down, hands touch the floor (15 sec)
3. Stand up, hands up, lean slightly back (10 sec)
4. Cat stretch: arch your back while sitting (10 sec)

update.restart_note: The app will close and update.
update.title: Update

tray.log_water: I drank a glass of water
